rows.label: qev031204_MSG0001
rows.name: ......[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031204_MSG0002
rows.name: Lavina![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031204_MSG0003
rows.name: Ha ha! You knew I would be here?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031204_MSG0004
rows.name:
Course I did! This is where we came that day we
snuck out of the city.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031204_MSG0005
rows.name:
It's where we promised our futures to each other.
Where else would you be?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031204_MSG0006
rows.name: ...Are those sapphire horns and ringstone?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031204_MSG0007
rows.name: Then show me you meant words you spoke here![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031204_MSG0008
rows.name:
When Prone woman's lover puts ring of beast horn on
her finger, they are bound together always.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031204_MSG0009
rows.name:
It is bond that none can break. Not even angry father.
Such is Prone way.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031204_MSG0010
rows.name:
Marry me, Leroy! Make me your mate here and now!
Will you do this?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031204_MSG0011
rows.name:
I'd like nothing better. I swear I'll make you happy,
Lavina. Forever.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031204_MSG0012
rows.name: I knew you would say that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031204_MSG0013
rows.name: Will you bear witness to union, Earth alien?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031204_JNK0010
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: qev031204_SEL0011
rows.name: Serve as a witness to the marriage.

rows.label: qev031204_JNK0020
rows.name: Refuse

rows.label: qev031204_SEL0021
rows.name:
Explain that your commitment to Lavina's father
makes you unable to bless their union.

rows.label: qev031204_MSG0014
rows.name:
My father and clansmen may shun me,
but at least one still values love. This gives me strength.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031204_MSG0015
rows.name: Thank you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031204_MSG0016
rows.name: To be wed with no blessing is lonesome thing.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031204_MSG0017
rows.name:
But this is path we choose. We stay on it.
Not matter what others say.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031204_MSG0018
rows.name: No! I won't allow it![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031204_MSG0019
rows.name: Stop this foolishness, Lavina! Come home at once![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031204_MSG0020
rows.name:
Eep! M-Mr. Gorida, sir!
Er...I guess I should call you Father now, huh?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031204_MSG0021
rows.name: Mind your tongue! I am father to no weakling.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031204_MSG0022
rows.name:
There they are, [ST:playername ].
Help me grab them.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031204_MSG0023
rows.name:
...Why do you wait? You must help! Or do you think
pathetic worm Leroy can keep my daughter safe?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031204_JNK0030
rows.name: Confirm

rows.label: qev031204_SEL0031
rows.name: Say that Leroy can take care of Lavina.

rows.label: qev031204_JNK0040
rows.name: Deny

rows.label: qev031204_SEL0041
rows.name: Admit that Leroy seems incapable of protecting anyone.

rows.label: qev031204_MSG0024
rows.name: Thank you. I... I promise I won't let you down.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031204_MSG0025
rows.name:
Grrngh! You betray me too? You seemed sensible.
Now I know no Earth alien can be trusted![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031204_MSG0026
rows.name:
Enough, traitor! Your blood will water fields first!
I won't let Earth aliens steal my daughter![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031204_MSG0027
rows.name: So no one has any faith in me?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031204_MSG0028
rows.name:
You are alone, dog! Now return Lavina to clan where
she belongs.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031204_MSG0029
rows.name:
This isn't about human or Prone. We love each other,
and will defend that love from any who threaten it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031204_MSG0030
rows.name: ...Lavina! This way![ST:wait ]

rows.label: NewText_51
rows.name: R-right![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031204_MSG0031
rows.name: Rgh... Coward! Everyone, after him![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031204_MSG0032
rows.name:
You help too, [ST:playername ].
We must take Lavina back from human weakling.[ST:wait ]
